review_text: It is one of the best app for beginners, I use this app from 2022. I love the interface, because very clean and neat. I never faced any glitches.

I have been using Groww app since 2021, when I first started my investing journey. This app is pretty much user friendly for anyone new to the investment tools like stocks, MF, ETF etc. and also for quick disbursal loans. I am very happy with the kind of services offered and the regular app updates which makes it even better.

Best App for Beginners & F&O Traders! Groww app has a very clean and simple interface. Everything is easy to understand, even for beginners. F&O trading is smooth, fast, and stress-free. No confusion, no unnecessary buttons. Charts are clear, order placing is quick, and the app doesn’t lag. I really like how easy it is to buy and sell options in just a few taps. If you want simple trading + powerful features, Groww is the best choice. Highly recommended for F&O, intraday, and long-term investors

Groww is one of the best and most user-friendly investment apps. The interface is very clean and easy to understand, even for beginners. Mutual funds, stocks, SIPs, and other investments are well organized, and transactions are smooth and fast. The app provides clear information, charts, and updates which help in making better decisions. Customer support is also responsive. Overall, Groww makes investing simple and stress-free. but i want Dragging SL(stop loss) or TP(target point ) option.

Dear Groww Support Team, I am using the Groww app, and until now I have not faced any issues with buying or selling shares. However, I am currently facing a problem with withdrawing my funds. The withdrawal amount is not being transferred immediately, whereas when I use the “Add Money” option, the amount is transferred to the Groww app instantly. I kindly request you to look into this issue and resolve the problem of delayed withdrawal as soon as possible.

Groww is one of the easiest and most user-friendly investment apps I have used. The interface is very clean and simple, making it easy to understand even for beginners. All information about stocks, mutual funds, SIPs, and charges is explained clearly. The app runs smoothly and investing can be done in just a few steps. It is a great platform for anyone who wants to start investing without confusion.”
I have naked option bought and later I want to convert it to bull call strategy. The margin required get very high. Why? Bring safe exit commodity FnO.

A new feature suggestion: after taking trade in scalping mode. we get disturbed when we see price fluctuations in pnl. so a instant hide or show pnl would be best to control mind( like show password or hide type option). please consider it. there is a space on right side of strike price and index selection option in Scalper mode where switch option was there in beginning. it is a humble request.

when i stared using this app, my experience was superb. After few days I have changed my mob number. The problem starting from here, my upi not working, bank in cooloff, upi pin not set these type of situation occurring one by one. I raised a ticket for kne problem, but another started. They closed the ticket without giving resolution. now I surly tell that they have offered one of the wrost customer service experience. Just disgusting.
Hello Team, you are always customer friendly. Request for previous open interest chart where numbers can be tracked. We are facing loss after app update.

This is a user-friendly platform. One more feature could be added where stocks are displayed based on their price range. For example, stocks priced between 1-10 rupees, 10-100 rupees, 100-1000 and those above 1000.

I’ve had a very good experience using this platform. The app is simple to use, smooth, and well designed for both beginners and regular investors. What I appreciate most is their customer support. Whenever I had an issue or a query, it was resolved quickly and clearly. Overall, their service feels reliable and user friendly, and it makes investing much easier.

"I really enjoy using the Groww app for its clean interface, but it is missing a crucial feature for active traders. But manually changing the Stop Loss and Target figures repeatedly is extremely irritating and time-consuming. In a fast-moving market, typing numbers manually creates panic. Please introduce On the Chart ,so we can simply "TRAILING SL" visually. This manual process is a huge hassle for traders."

one of the most useless app for Futures traders. everyday ur buying price will be adjusted will last day closing price. your PnL will start from zero next day. you wilo have to remember past days profit or keep an excel ir your positions increase. i will be shifting from Groww at the end of this month as this is not feasible and impacts the decision making process. i know there is MTM settlement everyday but what is the harm in showing your profit or loss like you do in options.
